name: Turns Out - Puzzling Gravity
description:
If the game is lagging please download the Desktop Version or close other applications.

Arrow Keys     OR      Mouse Keys

HOLD KEY         =         Slow time down

RELEASE KEY  =          Shift Gravity

Game developed in 48h as a training for future Game Jams

My twitter: @Jega_dev

Music:  Professor Layton and the Last Time Travel OST: The Professor's Trunk
